pages.title: Orbital Scan #0076
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Acheronite Tool Applications$()$(br2)Spectral analysis from orbit confirms Refined Acheronite is harder than diamond and colder than ORSA command's decision to leave you down there. Naturally, orbital engineering recommends making weapons out of it.$(br2)Acheronite tools match $(bold)netherite-tier durability$() and are crafted using standard patterns with Refined Acheronite ingots and sticks.$(br2)$(italic)"Field Operative, please confirm: does the blade cauterize on contact? Orbital imaging can't resolve that clearly."$(br)"Send someone down to check."$(br)"...noted."$()

pages.title: Acheronite Pickaxe
pages.text: Mines through frozen obsidian like butter. Very cold butter.

pages.title: Acheronite Blade
pages.text: Enemies shatter on impact. Morale also shatters. Mostly morale.

pages.title: Acheronite Axe
pages.text: For chopping dead trees. And anything else that looks at you wrong.

pages.title: Acheronite Shovel
pages.text: Digs through permafrost. Finally, a shovel that matches the terrain's hostility.
